dmca.title: Intellectual Property Situation.
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Gene Steinberg [mailto:gene@techbroadcasting.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 03, 2005 8:28 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Intellectual Property Situation.


George Poletes 
Legal Counsel
ThePlanet.com

I am the President of Making The Impossible, Inc., a Nevada corporation.

For nearly three years our radio show, The Tech Night Owl LIVE and its
predecessor, The Mac Night Owl LIVE, were carried over the macradio.com
server. The server is owned now by Mac Broadcasting LLC and hosted by your
network.

Nearly a month ago, in accordance with our contract with Mac Broadcasting
LLC, we notified them of our intention to move our content from the network.
The contract specified a 30-day prior notice for any changes in the
agreement to carry the show.

Despite said agreement, Mac Broadcasting LLC has refused to allow us to
present the show in the current industry-standard MP3 format as a Podcast.
They have also, without our authorization, made changes to our show page,
and removed my access to their server, so I am unable to correct the changes
and provide access to our current broadcast archive and the one that will be
streamed live on Thursday evening.

Since Making The Impossible, Inc. is the copyright holder to The Tech Night
Owl LIVE's content, Mac Broadcasting LLC does not have the authority to
continue to carry the show or host our content on their network in light of
this situation.

I have asked them via email and via instant message to remove all of our
content and provide a redirect link to our new show page, which is also part
of the original agreement.

At the present time, they are continuing to post this bogus show page at
macradio.com/thursday and a link at macradio.com without our permission. In
effect, they are attempting to compete with our genuine broadcast.

This presents a serious breech of our legal intellectual property rights
with regard to this material, and I am therefore asking you to block this
page and any other link to said bogus content.

The only authentic access to our show is presently available at
techbroadcasting.com.

If you have further questions, call me at 480-993-2399. To avoid any legal
complications, however, I hope you will comply with our request as soon as
possible.


_ _ _ _
Peace,
Gene Steinberg
Publisher/Editor, The Mac Night Owl
 <http://www.macnightowl.com/> http://www.macnightowl.com.
Host, The Tech Night Owl LIVE
http://www.techbroadcasting.com
Co-author, "Attack of the Rockoids"
 <http://www.rockoids.com/> http://www.rockoids.com
